name: Face Golf (BTP Jam)
description:
The ultimate face golfing experience!

Made for Blackthornprod Game Jam with theme "Less is More".

How do I play?

Each course will have it's own "par", to obtain points you must complete the level with making the least amount of moves possible.  If you've made more moves than the level par you obtain no points at the flag. At the end you'll be ranked on how well you did overall.

Controls:

-Left click + drag to fling the ball

- Right click to toggle the camera to the ball or to your mouse

-"R" to restart

Credit:

Art and code was all made by me.

Ecrett music was used for the music.
